attributes.action: To launch an investigation into election spending in 2015.
attributes.background: A recent Channel 4 News report has revealed alledged overspending in 3 recent By Elections. The news article alluded that our electoral system is woefully inadequate to tackle this type of fraud. This brings into question the results, results that shocked everyone, of the last General Election.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Electoral Commission is responsible for investigating concerns about campaign spending. The Electoral Commission is independent of the UK Parliament and Government.

You could raise your suggestion with the Electoral Commission directly using the following website: http://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/contact-us

If you would like Parliament to change the law relating to campaign finance, you could start a petition calling for the specific change you would like.
